app_id.description: App identifier as found in AppsFlyer.

api_token_v1.description: Pull API token for authentication V1. If you change the account admin, the token changes, and you must update scripts with the new token. Get the API token in the Dashboard.

api_token_v2.description: Pull API token for authentication V2. Only used for Cohorts Report. Cohorts report will not be available if you'll leave this field blank.

start_date.description: Start replication date in format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss

end_date.description: End replication date in format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss

last_days.title: Load last N days
last_days.description: If not set â€“ last 30 days will be used

chunked_reports_config.title: Split Download Into Chunks
chunked_reports_config.description: Connector can split data replication into several logs instead of only one. You can choice days count on every chunk.

split_range_units_count.title: Unit Count
split_range_units_count.description: E.g. if you choose 4 hours, whole logs will be split into several reports by every 4 hours (6 parts for every day). It can increase replication time, so don't set too small range. Minimum - 1

timezone.description: Time zone in which date times are stored. The project timezone may be found in the App settings in the AppsFlyer console.

in_app_events_event_name_filter.title: In-App Events Filter
in_app_events_event_name_filter.description: Filter in-app events by specified events. Select multiple events by using a comma-separated list.
